config.script:
try:
	
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1			
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=0
		self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=0	
		self.getChild("root").getChild("ddlSelectRow").props.value=10
		self.getChild("root").getChild("btnprev").meta.visible=0
		self.getChild("root").getChild("btnnext").meta.visible=0
		self.getChild("root").getChild("btnfirst").meta.visible=0
		self.getChild("root").getChild("btnLast").meta.visible=0

		self.getChild("root").getChild("txtGotoPage").meta.visible=0
		
		
		self.getChild("root").getChild("ddlSelectRow").meta.visible=0
		self.getChild("root").getChild("txtSearch").meta.visible=0
		self.getChild("root").getChild("lblSearch").meta.visible=0
				
		self.getChild("root").getChild("lblCurrentPage").meta.visible=0
		self.getChild("root").getChild("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=0
		self.getChild("root").getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("TableRequests").meta.visible = True
		self.getChild("root").getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("Msglbl").meta.visible = True
		self.getChild("root").getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("TableDetails").meta.visible = False
		self.getChild("root").getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("ButtonBack").meta.visible = False
		userId =self.session.custom.UserId

		lineDetails = WorkOrderDetailsAPI.getAutoLinesByUserID(userId)
		system.perspective.print('Line List : ' + str(lineDetails))
		self.getChild("root").getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("LineDropdown_2").props.options=lineDetails
#		selectedLineId = 0
#		system.perspective.openPopup('LoaderPopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/Loader/LoaderPopup',draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
#		SubmittedWORequests=MaterialRequestAPI.GetPrevioussubmittedRequest(selectedLineId,userId)
#		self.getChild("root").getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("TableRequests").props.data = SubmittedWORequests
#		system.perspective.closePopup('LoaderPopup')
		self.custom.HistoryDetailsTypes = 1 #To show the Details for only Workorder------>
	except:
		import sys, os
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		errorMessage = "'Exception :: Production Operator Console: View Preivious Request: On startup ':"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || Line No :' + str(lineno))
		Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)

self.session.custom.ReasonWHOC = ""
	self.session.custom.ReasonCodeIDWHOC = ""
	self.session.custom.ToLocatorWHOC = ""
	self.session.custom.FromLocatorIdWHOC = ""
	self.session.custom.ToSubInventoryWHOC = ""
	self.session.custom.FromSubInventoryIdWHOC = ""
	self.session.custom.subInventoryCode = ""
	self.session.custom.requestWHComments = ""
	self.session.custom.requestType = ""
	self.session.custom.requestPartID = ""
	self.session.custom.requestNameWHOC = ""
	self.session.custom.requestID = ""
	self.session.custom.locatorWHOC = ""
	self.session.custom.WHrequestedDate = "" 
	self.session.custom.SubInventoryCode = ""
	self.session.custom.UOM = ""
	self.session.custom.FromSubInventoryName = ""
	system.perspective.print("Session Tags Cleared Successfully on Close")
	system.perspective.closePopup("")

try:
		dtSet=self.props.data	
		selRow=self.props.selection.selectedRow
		selColumn=self.props.selection.selectedColumn	
		if selColumn == str("ViewDetails").strip():
			BatchId = dtSet.getValueAt(selRow,"BatchId") #--Changed from Wo to BatchID 
			self.view.custom.CurrentlySelectedBatchId = BatchId
			self.view.custom.HistoryDetailsTypes = 2  #View Batch Request Details 
			system.perspective.print('BatchId :' + str(BatchId))
			data=MaterialRequestAPI.GetsubmitedRequest(BatchId)
			system.perspective.print('data :' + str(data))
			self.getSibling("TableDetails").props.data = data
			self.getSibling("TableDetails").meta.visible = True
			self.getSibling("ButtonBack").meta.visible = True
			self.getSibling("Msglbl").meta.visible = False
			self.view.custom.PaginationObject = 0
		else:
			pass
	except:
		import sys, os
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		errorMessage = "'Exception :: Production Operator Console: View Preivious Request: Row Click table ':"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || Line No :' + str(lineno))
		Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)

try:
		selectedLineId = self.props.value
		userId = self.session.custom.UserId
		Start=0
		length=self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("ddlSelectRow").props.value
		Search=''

		SubmittedWO = MaterialRequestAPI.GetPaginationPreMaterialRequestDetails(Start,length,Search,selectedLineId,userId)
		dsSubmittedWO=system.dataset.toPyDataSet(SubmittedWO)
		system.perspective.print("dsSubmittedWO len"+str(len(dsSubmittedWO)))
		
		if len(dsSubmittedWO) > 0:
			
			self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=0
			self.getSibling("TableRequests").meta.visible = True
			self.getSibling("TableRequests").props.data =SubmittedWO
			self.getSibling("ButtonBack").meta.visible = False
			self.getSibling("TableDetails").meta.visible = False
			
			self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1
			Start=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage
#			self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=10
			self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=length
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("txtGotoPage").props.value=1
			
			cnt= dsSubmittedWO[0]['recordsTotal']
			
			
			
			page=int(cnt/self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord)
			modpage=cnt%self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
			


			
			if modpage>0:
				page=page+1
			self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=page	
			
			system.perspective.print('paginationTotalRecordPages:' + str(self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages))
			
			
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnprev").meta.visible=1
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnnext").meta.visible=1
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnfirst").meta.visible=1
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnLast").meta.visible=1
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=1
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("txtGotoPage").meta.visible=1
#			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("txtSearch").meta.visible=1
#			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblSearch").meta.visible=1
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("ddlSelectRow").meta.visible=1
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblCurrentPage").meta.visible=1
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=1
			
			
		else:
		
		
			self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1			
			self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=0
			self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=0	
			self.getSibling("TableRequests").props.data =SubmittedWO
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnprev").meta.visible=0
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnnext").meta.visible=0
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnfirst").meta.visible=0
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnLast").meta.visible=0
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("ddlSelectRow").meta.visible=0
			
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=0
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("txtGotoPage").meta.visible=0
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblCurrentPage").meta.visible=0
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=0
			


			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("txtSearch").meta.visible=0
			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblSearch").meta.visible=0
		
			pass
	except:
		import sys, os
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		errorMessage = "'Exception :: Production Operator Console: View Preivious Request: Line Dropdown ':"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || Line No :' + str(lineno))
		Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=0
		self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=0

self.getSibling("TableDetails").meta.visible = False
	self.getSibling("TableRequests").meta.visible = True
	self.getSibling("Msglbl").meta.visible = True
	self.meta.visible = False
	self.view.custom.HistoryDetailsTypes = 1
	self.view.custom.CurrentlySelectedBatchId =  ''
#	----------------Pagination Object------------------------------
	self.view.custom.PaginationObject = 1

props.text: Note: Please click to view requested material

config.script:
try:
		PreviousHistoryDetails=self.view.custom.HistoryDetailsTypes
		system.perspective.print('PreviousHistoryDetails : ' + str(PreviousHistoryDetails))
		self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("ddlSelectRow").props.value=10
		if PreviousHistoryDetails == 1:
			selectedLineId = self.getSibling("LineDropdown_2").props.value
			userId = self.session.custom.UserId
			if str(selectedLineId).strip().lower() == str("none").strip().lower():
				selectedLineId=0
			else:
				pass

			if selectedLineId != '':
				self.getSibling("TableRequests").meta.visible = True
				self.getSibling("TableDetails").meta.visible = False

				system.perspective.print('selectedLineId : ' + str(selectedLineId))
				system.perspective.openPopup('LoaderPopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/Loader/LoaderPopup',draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
				try:
					selectedLineId = self.getSibling("LineDropdown_2").props.value
					userId = self.session.custom.UserId
					Start=0
					length=self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("ddlSelectRow").props.value
					Search=''

					SubmittedWO = MaterialRequestAPI.GetPaginationPreMaterialRequestDetails(Start,length,Search,selectedLineId,userId)
				except:
					system.perspective.closePopup('LoaderPopup')
					import sys, os
					exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
					lineno = tb.tb_lineno
					errorMessage = "'Exception :: Production Operator Console REfresh GetPaginationPreMaterialRequestDetails':"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
					system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || ' + str(lineno))
					Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)	
					
					
					
				self.getSibling("TableRequests").props.data=SubmittedWO
				dsSubmittedWO=system.dataset.toPyDataSet(SubmittedWO)
				system.perspective.closePopup('LoaderPopup')
			else:
				system.perspective.openPopup('LoaderPopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/Loader/LoaderPopup',draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
				selectedLineId=0
				try:
					SubmittedWO=MaterialRequestAPI.GetPrevioussubmittedRequest(selectedLineId,userId)
				except:
					system.perspective.closePopup('LoaderPopup')
				self.getSibling("TableRequests").props.data=SubmittedWO
				dsSubmittedWO=system.dataset.toPyDataSet(SubmittedWO)
			if len(dsSubmittedWO) > 0:
				self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1
				Start=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage
				self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=10
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("txtGotoPage").props.value=1
				cnt= dsSubmittedWO[0]['recordsTotal']			
				page=int(cnt/self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord)
				modpage=cnt%self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord		
				
				if modpage>0:
					page=page+1
				self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=page	
				
				
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnprev").meta.visible=1
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnnext").meta.visible=1
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnfirst").meta.visible=1
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnLast").meta.visible=1
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=1
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("txtGotoPage").meta.visible=1
	#			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("txtSearch").meta.visible=1
	#			self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblSearch").meta.visible=1
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("ddlSelectRow").meta.visible=1
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblCurrentPage").meta.visible=1
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=1				
			else:	
				self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1			
				self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=0
				self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=0	
				self.getSibling("TableRequests").props.data =SubmittedWO
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnprev").meta.visible=0
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnnext").meta.visible=0
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnfirst").meta.visible=0
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("btnLast").meta.visible=0
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("ddlSelectRow").meta.visible=0
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=0
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("txtGotoPage").meta.visible=0
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblCurrentPage").meta.visible=0
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=0	
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("txtSearch").meta.visible=0
				self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("lblSearch").meta.visible=0
				
				system.perspective.closePopup('LoaderPopup')
		else:
			selectedBatchId = self.view.custom.CurrentlySelectedBatchId
			system.perspective.openPopup('LoaderPopup','Project_MES_Solution/ProductionOperatorConsole/PopUps/Loader/LoaderPopup',draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
			try:
				getRefreshedMaterialRequestDetails=MaterialRequestAPI.GetsubmitedRequest(selectedBatchId)
			except:
				system.perspective.closePopup('LoaderPopup')
				pass
			self.getSibling("TableDetails").props.data=getRefreshedMaterialRequestDetails
			system.perspective.closePopup('LoaderPopup')
			
	except:
		import sys, os
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		errorMessage = "'Exception :: Production Operator Console Landing Page: On Startup':"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || ' + str(lineno))
		Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)

tooltip.text:
Not Started: All requested materials are not dispatched,
 In-Progress: Some materials are dispatched, Complete: All requested materials are dispathched

config.script:
try:
		LineId=self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("LineDropdown_2").props.value
		userId = self.session.custom.UserId
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1
		Start=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage
		Search=self.getSibling("txtSearch").props.text
		Search=str(Search).strip()
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=self.props.value
		Start=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage
		if Start>0:
			Start=Start-1
		else:
			pass
		length=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
	#	WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WOIdForPacking
		WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WorkorderID
	#	ds=PackingAndLabelling.GetWorkOrderPackageConfigurationsDetails(Start,length,Search,WorkOrderId)
		ds = MaterialRequestAPI.GetPaginationPreMaterialRequestDetails(Start,length,Search,LineId,userId)
		system.perspective.print(ds)
		self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("TableRequests").props.data=ds
		ds=system.dataset.toPyDataSet(ds)
		if len(ds)>0 and ds!=None:
			if len(ds)>0:
				cnt= ds[0]['recordsTotal']
				page=int(cnt/self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord)
				modpage=cnt%self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
				if modpage>0:
					page=page+1
				self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=page
				
				system.perspective.print("paginationTotalRecordPages "+str(self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages))
				system.perspective.print("paginationCurrentPage "+str(self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage))
	except:
			import sys, os
			exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
			lineno = tb.tb_lineno
			errorMessage = "'Exception :: Production Operator Console: View Preivious Request: Line Dropdown ':"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
			system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || Line No :' + str(lineno))
			Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)

try:
		LineId=self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("LineDropdown_2").props.value
		userId = self.session.custom.UserId
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1
		Start=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage
		Search=self.getSibling("txtSearch").props.text
		Search=str(Search).strip()
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=self.props.value
		Start=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage
		if Start>0:
			Start=Start-1
		else:
			pass
		length=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
	#	WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WOIdForPacking
		WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WorkorderID
	#	ds=PackingAndLabelling.GetWorkOrderPackageConfigurationsDetails(Start,length,Search,WorkOrderId)
		ds = MaterialRequestAPI.GetPaginationPreMaterialRequestDetails(Start,length,Search,LineId,userId)
		system.perspective.print(ds)
		self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("TableRequests").props.data=ds
		ds=system.dataset.toPyDataSet(ds)
		if len(ds)>0 and ds!=None:
			if len(ds)>0:
				cnt= ds[0]['recordsTotal']
				page=int(cnt/self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord)
				modpage=cnt%self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
				if modpage>0:
					page=page+1
				self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=page
				
				system.perspective.print("paginationTotalRecordPages "+str(self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages))
				system.perspective.print("paginationCurrentPage "+str(self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage))
	except:
			import sys, os
			exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
			lineno = tb.tb_lineno

onChange.script:
try:
		LineId=self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("LineDropdown_2").props.value
		userId = self.session.custom.UserId
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1
		Start=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage
		Search=self.getSibling("txtSearch").props.text
		Search=str(Search).strip()
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=self.props.value
		Start=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage
		if Start>0:
			Start=Start-1
		else:
			pass
		length=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
	#	WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WOIdForPacking
		WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WorkorderID
	#	ds=PackingAndLabelling.GetWorkOrderPackageConfigurationsDetails(Start,length,Search,WorkOrderId)
		ds = MaterialRequestAPI.GetPaginationPreMaterialRequestDetails(Start,length,Search,LineId,userId)
		system.perspective.print(ds)
		self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("TableRequests").props.data=ds
		ds=system.dataset.toPyDataSet(ds)
		if len(ds)>0 and ds!=None:
			if len(ds)>0:
				cnt= ds[0]['recordsTotal']
				page=int(cnt/self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord)
				modpage=cnt%self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
				if modpage>0:
					page=page+1
				self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=page
				
				system.perspective.print("paginationTotalRecordPages "+str(self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages))
				system.perspective.print("paginationCurrentPage "+str(self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage))
	except:
			import sys, os
			exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
			lineno = tb.tb_lineno

			system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || Line No :' + str(lineno))
			Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)

try:

		Start=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage

			Start=Start-1

		APIParameter={"Start":Start,"length":length,"Search":Search}
		system.perspective.print("APIParameter: "+str(APIParameter))

		self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("TableRequests").props.data=ds
		
	except Exception as e:
		system.perspective.print("error in print " +str(e))

	userId = self.session.custom.UserId
	Search=self.getSibling("txtSearch").props.text

	self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage - 1

	if Start>0:
		Start=Start-1
	else:
		pass
	length=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord

			Start=Start-1

#		system.perspective.print ( "printer start")

	except Exception as e:
		system.perspective.print("error in print " +str(e))

LineId=self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("LineDropdown_2").props.value
	userId = self.session.custom.UserId
	Search=self.getSibling("txtSearch").props.text
	Search=str(Search).strip()
	self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages
	Start=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage
	if Start>0:
		Start=Start-1
	else:
		pass
	length=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
#	WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WOIdForPacking
	WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WorkorderID

	ds = MaterialRequestAPI.GetPaginationPreMaterialRequestDetails(Start,length,Search,LineId,userId)
	system.perspective.print(ds)

try:
		LineId=self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("LineDropdown_2").props.value
		userId = self.session.custom.UserId
		gotopage=self.props.value
		if gotopage>0 and gotopage<=self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages:
			Search=self.getSibling("txtSearch").props.text
			Search=str(Search).strip()
			Start=gotopage
			if Start>0:
				Start=Start-1
			else:
				pass
			length=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
			WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WOIdForPacking
#			ds=PackingAndLabelling.GetWorkOrderPackageConfigurationsDetails(Start,length,Search,WorkOrderId)
			ds = MaterialRequestAPI.GetPaginationPreMaterialRequestDetails(Start,length,Search,LineId,userId)
			system.perspective.print(ds)
			self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("TableRequests").props.data=ds
			self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=gotopage
		else:
			self.props.value=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage
	except :
		self.props.value=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage

LineId=self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("LineDropdown_2").props.value
	userId=self.session.custom.UserId
	Search=self.props.text
	Search=str(Search).strip()
	system.perspective.print("call search "+str(Search))
	if str(Search)=='' or Search==None or Search=='None' or Search =='null':
		Search=''
	try: 
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1
		self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=self.getSibling("ddlSelectRow").props.value
		Start=0
		self.getSibling("txtGotoPage").props.value=1				
		self.getSibling("txtGotoPage").meta.visible=1
		self.getSibling("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=1
		self.getSibling("btnprev").meta.visible=1
		self.getSibling("btnnext").meta.visible=1
		self.getSibling("btnfirst").meta.visible=1
		self.getSibling("btnLast").meta.visible=1
		self.getSibling("lblCurrentPage").meta.visible=1
		self.getSibling("ddlSelectRow").meta.visible=1
		length=self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
#		WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WOIdForPacking
		WorkOrderId=self.session.custom.WorkorderID
		ds=MaterialRequestAPI.GetPaginationPreMaterialRequestDetails(Start,length,Search,LineId,userId)
		system.perspective.print("API Search Result: "+str(ds))		
		self.parent.getChild("cntColumn").getChild("CoordinateContainer_4").getChild("TableRequests").props.data= ds
		if ds!=None:
			ds=system.dataset.toPyDataSet(ds)
			if len(ds)>0 and ds!=None:
				if len(ds)>0:
					cnt= ds[0]['recordsTotal']
					page=int(cnt/self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord)
					modpage=cnt%self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord
					if modpage>0:
						page=page+1
					self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=page	
					self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1
		else:
		
			self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=1			
#			self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPageLastRecord=0
			self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=0		
			
			self.getSibling("btnprev").meta.visible=0
			self.getSibling("btnnext").meta.visible=0
			self.getSibling("btnfirst").meta.visible=0
			self.getSibling("btnLast").meta.visible=0
			self.getSibling("lblCurrentPage").meta.visible=0
			self.getSibling("ddlSelectRow").meta.visible=0
			self.getSibling("txtGotoPage").meta.visible=0
			self.getSibling("lblGotoPage").meta.visible=0

					

	except Exception as e:
			system.perspective.print("exceptions in Plant Data while reciving search a data= " + str(e))
			self.session.custom.paginationCurrentPage=0
			self.session.custom.paginationTotalRecordPages=0
